    Customer that generates different orders.

    1.3

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Customer​(SpeechBubble speechbubble)
      The "Customer" constructor creates a new Customer object and generates a random order.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Customer

        public Customer​(SpeechBubble speechbubble)
        The "Customer" constructor creates a new Customer object and generates a random order. The order is displayed in the provided speech bubble.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        The "act" method of this "Actor" object increments the wait time and displays it if time is not stopped.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • checkOrder

        public boolean checkOrder()
        This method is responsible for checking the order of the customer and the plate of the burger. If the order matches with the burger on the plate, it stops the timer and the customer pays. If the order does not match with the burger on the plate, it returns false. The method prints out the contents of the plate and order for debugging purposes.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the order matches with the burger on the plate

      • getOrder

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOrder()
        Returns the list of ingredients in the customer's order.

      • displayTime

        public void displayTime()
        Function to display the time for a customer in the simulation. The display time is the wait time of the customer in seconds, divided by 10 and shown as minutes:seconds.
